autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the many blessings in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I secretly wished that others' accomplishments would be undone, so I wouldn't feel inferior by comparison?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar or hurtful language?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in ways that may have offended or hurt them
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar or inappropriate language, using my words in ways that may have offended or hurt them?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in ways that were crude or unbecoming
incontinence.question: Did I show poor self-control through my words, speaking to others in ways that were crude or unbecoming?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: to treats or meals that are not necessary for my daily sustenance
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating, especially when it comes to treats or meals that are not necessary for my daily sustenance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking at social gatherings beyond what is reasonable for my personal well - being
beyond what is reasonable for my personal well - being
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking at social gatherings beyond what is reasonable for my personal well-being?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, demonstrating an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and rejecting the call to temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' private affairs through online comments , messages , or conversations with friends
through online comments , messages , or conversations with friends
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs through online comments, messages, or conversations with friends, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I entertained myself by sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through conversations or online interactions?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

defraud.question: Did I use my work-related activities on Sunday for personal gain when it otherwise could be avoided?
defraud.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impurity.question: Did you use substances, practices, or objects to intentionally prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
